import React, { Component } from "react"; class Calculator extends React.Component { state = { apiKey: "4b2ea96ceadc94e3995c", currency: "CAD", prev_currency: "CAD", cur_codes: { CAD: $, USD: $, NGN: ₦, EUR: €, INR: ₹, GBP: £, WON: ₨, PHP: ↿, AED: د.إ, JPY: ¥ }, currencies: { CAD: "CAD", USD: "USD", NGN: "NGN", EUR: "EUR", INR: "INR", GBP: "GBP", WON: "WON", PHP: "ZAR", AED: "AED", JPY: "CNY" }, values: { chequing: 2000.0, savings_for_taxes: 4000.0, rainy_day_fund: 506.0, savings_for_fun: 5000.0, savings_for_travel: 400.0, savings_for_personal_development: 200.0, investment_1: 5000.0, investment_2: 60000.0, investment_3: 24000.0, primary_home: 455000.0, second_home: 1564321.0, credit_card_1: 4342.0, credit_card_2: 322.0, mortgage_1: 250999.0, mortgage_2: 632634.0, line_of_credit: 10000.0, investment_loan: 10000.0 }, vall: 0 }; convertCurrency = (fromCurrency, toCurrency) => { fromCurrency = encodeURIComponent(fromCurrency); toCurrency = encodeURIComponent(toCurrency); var query = fromCurrency + "_" + toCurrency; var url = "https://free.currconv.com/api/v7/convert?q=" + query + "&compact=ultra&apiKey=" + this.state.apiKey; fetch(url) .then(res => res.json()) .then(result => { result = result[query]; let updated_values = {}; for (const [key, value] of Object.entries(this.state.values)) { console.log(`${key}: ${value}`); var total = value * result; total = Math.round(total * 100) / 100; updated_values[key] = total; } this.setState({ values: updated_values, prev_currency: toCurrency }); console.log(this.state); }); }; getCurrency = e => { this.setState({ currency: e.target.value }); console.log(e.data); this.convertCurrency(this.state.prev_currency, e.target.value); }; numberWithCommas(x) { return x.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ","); } render() { return (

); } } export default Calculator;
